alert.note: Alert for Cullman; DeKalb; Jackson; Madison; Marshall; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 11:49AM CST until March 03 at 12:15PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM CST FOR MARSHALL...CENTRAL JACKSON...SOUTHERN MADISON...SOUTHWESTERN DEKALB...CENTRAL CULLMAN AND SOUTHEASTERN MORGAN COUNTIES... At 1148 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near New Market to 7 miles northwest of Holly Pond, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Madison, Albertville, Cullman, Scottsboro, Boaz, Guntersville, Arab, Rainsville and Redstone Arsenal. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for north central and northwestern Alabama...and Middle Tennessee. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 PM CST for northeastern Alabama...and Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Cullman; DeKalb; Jackson; Madison; Marshall; Morgan
